MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the KA7 postcode area of Ayr. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:45pm due to a faulty pillar at the junction of Holmston Drive and Forehill Road and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to isolate the faulty pillar affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:09 PM on Tuesday, 13 October 2020.
